statements: SELECT * FROM CropRotation;
SELECT crop_type, season, rotation_number FROM CropRotation;
SELECT * FROM CropRotation WHERE season = 1;
SELECT crop_type, rotation_number FROM CropRotation WHERE season = 2;
SELECT season, crop_type FROM CropRotation ORDER BY rotation_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropRotation ORDER BY rotation_number DESC, season ASC
SELECT season, crop_type FROM CropRotation WHERE season > 1 AND crop_type = 'Wheat'
SELECT DISTINCT season FROM CropRotation WHERE crop_type IN ('Corn', 'Beans')
SELECT crop_type, COUNT(*) AS total_rotations FROM CropRotation GROUP BY crop_type ORDER BY total_rotations DESC
SELECT * FROM CropRotation WHERE rotation_number BETWEEN 2 AND 4
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_practices;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_practices WHERE season = 1;
SELECT plot_id, crop_name, season FROM crop_rotation_practices ORDER BY season DESC;
SELECT location, soil_type FROM plot_details WHERE plot_size > 10;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_practices WHERE crop_name LIKE '%corn%';
SELECT plot_id, crop_name, season, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_practices WHERE season = 1;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_practices WHERE crop_name LIKE 'Wheat%' ORDER BY season DESC;
SELECT plot_id, location, soil_type FROM plot_details WHERE soil_type = 'clay' AND terrain_type = 'hilltop';
SELECT plot_id, location, plot_size FROM plot_details WHERE plot_size > 10 ORDER BY plot_size ASC, location;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_practices WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation;
SELECT plot_id, crop_name, rotation_start_date FROM crop_rotation WHERE season_id = 1 ORDER BY rotation_start_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_end_date, rotation_start_date FROM crop_rotation WHERE crop_name = 'Carrot' AND season_id = 2;
SELECT plot_number, plot_size, soil_type FROM plot WHERE soil_type = 'Sandy' ORDER BY plot_number;
SELECT season_name, year FROM season WHERE year > 2020;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation WHERE crop_name = 'corn' ORDER BY rotation_start_date DESC;
SELECT plot_id, crop_name, rotation_start_date, rotation_end_date FROM crop_rotation WHERE season_id = 1 ORDER BY rotation_end_date ASC;
SELECT plot_id, plot_number, plot_size, soil_type FROM plot WHERE soil_type = 'clay' AND plot_size > 10 ORDER BY plot_number;
SELECT plot_id, season_name, year FROM season s JOIN crop_rotation cr ON s.season_id = cr.season_id WHERE cr.crop_name = 'wheat' ORDER BY s.year DESC;
SELECT plot_id, crop_name, rotation_start_date, rotation_end_date FROM crop_rotation WHERE season_id = 2 AND crop_name IN ('soybean', 'peanut') ORDER BY rotation_start_date;
SELECT * FROM plot;
SELECT plot_id, location FROM plot ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT crop_id, name, type FROM crop WHERE type='Vegetable';
SELECT * FROM rotation WHERE season=1 ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT plot_id, area FROM plot WHERE area > 100 ORDER BY area DESC;
SELECT * FROM plot WHERE area > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT p.location, c.name FROM plot p JOIN rotation r ON p.plot_id = r.plot_id JOIN crop c ON r.crop_id = c.crop_id WHERE c.type = 'Vegetable' AND r.season = 1;
SELECT p.location, c.name, r.season FROM crop c LEFT JOIN rotation r ON c.crop_id = r.crop_id RIGHT JOIN plot p ON r.plot_id = p.plot_id WHERE r.harvest_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.name, s.name AS season_name FROM crop c JOIN season s ON c.type = s.name;
SELECT DISTINCT p.location FROM plot p JOIN rotation r ON p.plot_id = r.plot_id WHERE r.harvest_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.location DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE type = 'Fruit';
SELECT crop_name, variety FROM crops WHERE crop_name = 'Apples';
SELECT season_number, year FROM seasons WHERE year > 2020 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT id, season_id, yield FROM crop_history WHERE yield > 1000;
SELECT plot_number, location FROM plots WHERE location LIKE '%field%' ORDER BY plot_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM rotations WHERE season = 1 ORDER BY rotation_sequence DESC;
SELECT crop_name, variety FROM crops WHERE type = 'Vegetable' AND variety IS NOT NULL;
SELECT season_number, year, start_date, end_date FROM seasons WHERE year >= 2019 ORDER BY year DESC, season_number ASC;
SELECT plot_size, location FROM plots WHERE location LIKE '%Farm%' OR location LIKE '%Field%';
SELECT id, crop_id, season_id, yield, quality FROM crop_history WHERE yield > 100 ORDER BY yield DESC, season_id ASC, id DESC;
